name: ADAEH (Academia de Aviación de Honduras)
about: ADAEH (Academia de Aviación de Honduras) is a non-governmental organization dedicated to the promotion and development of the aeronautical sector in Honduras. With a focus on fostering aviation skills and knowledge, ADAEH provides comprehensive training programs for aspiring pilots. Our mission is to equip students with the necessary skills and certifications to succeed in the aviation industry, while promoting safety and excellence in flight training. We are committed to building a strong foundation for the next generation of Honduran aviators, ensuring they are well-prepared for their careers in aviation. At ADAEH, we strive to create a supportive and professional environment that encourages growth and achievement in the field of aviation.
services:
